title: When a rekt player loses his shit & goes all "OMG LEAGUE TAKES NO SKILLS AT ALL!!"
body:
And despite those words, he's nowhere near Platinum at all, so the enemy team & his teammates were like:

http://replygif.net/i/1352.gif
https://media.giphy.com/media/L8XuphFGqlSfe/giphy.gif
https://media.giphy.com/media/HPvfnOuz1tOgg/giphy.gif

replies.body: I mean, If they say that while losing that means that they are implying that they have minus skill.
That moment when you have less skill than having no skill
